title: All t204s now sold...thanks everyone for the interest!
author: shammus

posts.post_title: All t204s now sold...thanks everyone for the interest!
posts.post_content:
These are more of a "collector grade" than the ones I had previously.  Like before, I have several for sale and also a few that I'd be willing to "downgrade".  

Also, I'm drawing to an end on my t204 project.  I just need the following 13 cards and would be willing to trade in your favor for any of the following -

Beebe, Burchell, Carrigan, Graham, Hemphill, Kahoe, Manning, Milan, Morgan, Raymond, Smith, Stephens, Sweeney

A couple scans are attached although I'll provide nicer ones upon request.  Prices include shipping/insurance.  Thanks in advance,
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

Cards for Sale Only
Schulte SGC 20 - a couple light corner wrinkles --- $110 [SOLD!]
Freeman PR/FR - couple creases --- $95 [SOLD!]
T. Jones FR/GD - corner wrinkle/mild surface wear --- $95
Schekard GD - a couple tiny corner wrinkles --- $110 [SOLD!]
Hartzell PR/FR - surface wear/mild staining --- $95
Shipke GD - small bits of paper stuck to reverse --- $110 [SOLD!]
Lush Awful - wear/wrinkling on front--- $75
Lush Awful (#2) - wear/wrinkling on front --- $75
Steinfeldt PR/FR - a couple heavier creases --- $95 [SOLD!]
Unclane (borders trimmed) - tough card in the set! --- $25

Cards for Downgrading Purposes Only
Clymer SGC 70
McAleer PSA 5
Lobert PSA 4
Niles PSA 5
Reulbach SGC 50
Dorner SGC 55
Reilly SGC 50
Davis SGC 50 

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=149818&d=1403323006[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=149819&d=1403323020[/IMG]

The t204s went fast this time!  Down to just a few left.  All of these are, coincidentally enough, St. Louis players except for Unclane (Wash).

The cards I have available for downgrading purposes are still available as well....

T. Jones FR/GD - corner wrinkle/mild surface wear --- $95
Hartzell PR/FR - surface wear/mild staining --- $95
Lush Awful - wear/wrinkling on front--- $75
Lush Awful (#2) - wear/wrinkling on front --- $75
Unclane (borders trimmed) - tough card in the set! --- $25

Lowering all prices on the few remaining cards....

T. Jones FR/GD - corner wrinkle/mild surface wear --- $80
Hartzell PR/FR - surface wear/mild staining --- $80
Lush Awful - wear/wrinkling on front --- $50
Lush Awful (#2) - wear/wrinkling on front --- $50
Unclane (borders trimmed) - tough card in the set! --- $20

Prices lowered on the remaining cards a second time.  Very few t204s are remaining and these are priced to move quickly :)

T. Jones FR/GD - corner wrinkle/mild surface wear --- $75
Hartzell PR/FR - surface wear/mild staining --- $65
Lush Awful - wear/wrinkling on front --- $40
Lush Awful (#2) - wear/wrinkling on front --- $40
Unclane (borders trimmed) - tough card in the set! --- $20

***  All t204s have now been sold, thanks everyone for the interest! ****
